content: Fix ForceHTTP1_test.go - Add missing FullResp type definition
Fix websocket_test.go - Update to wss://, add headers, use CycleTLS client
Fix sse_test.go - Add event counter and timeout protection to prevent infinite loop
Fix http3_test.go - Add optimal QUIC config and document buffer settings
Fix latest_fingerprint_test.go - Research and fix HTTP2 pseudo-header ordering for Firefox
Fix WebSocket test to handle echo.websocket.org non-echo response
Fix FullResp redeclaration between ForceHTTP1_test.go and InsecureSkipVerify_test.go
Fix 'use of closed network connection' error in TestHTTP2 - investigation shows separation of regular vs pseudo headers needed
Header order functionality restored - regular headers vs pseudo-headers properly separated
